summary: A comprehensive test suite for the WSIReader component of the MONAI library, exercising various back‑ends (CuCIM, OpenSlide, TIFF) and features such as error handling, malformed inputs, region extraction, multi‑threaded and multi‑slide processing, whole‑image loading, color format handling, resolution conversion, and integration with MONAI data loading pipelines.
business_intent: Validate and guarantee the correctness, robustness, and compatibility of whole‑slide image reading functionality across different file formats and back‑ends, ensuring reliable image preprocessing for medical imaging workflows.
